name: Take Care of Your Munchies and Learn Nutrition
name_original: Take Care of Your Munchies and Learn Nutrition
description:
Shooter game where you can learn how cooking and nutritional values can influence your munchy.

WARNING: lots of flicks in the game, be careful with epilepsy. If you have problems with the web version try the PC downloadable version.

  • Aim and shoot with the mouse.
  • Control the character with W, A, S, D
  • Change weapons with 1, 2, 3
  • Dash with F
  • Display tutorial with ESC
  • Shoot the food until is cooked and then it will travel automatically towards your munchy.

Made by a team of 2 brothers (Software Engineer + Artist)

Music and most sounds effect licensed from Envato Elements except the yum yum and puke sound effects that are home made.

Used Unity Engine and Top Down Asset from More Montains.

Check the development stream here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TBM8zTRk8Mw&list=PLkJ64VTCstqO_6ssbTEytkUz5rVU79Da-
